item.description:
DRUM PARTY!!!

When
December 11, 2010
12:00pm-4:00pm

Location:
My House
17 Ibbetson St.
Somerville, MA 02143
508-243-6257

Here's what you'll find:
Djembes and Cases
Djuns (the big drums)
Xylophones
Shakers
Jewelry from Africa and Morocco
Massage Gift Certificates from a Fabulous Massage Therapist (my roommate)
One-of-a-kind Paintings (from my other roommate)

So skip the mall and come over to our place for your shopping this year. (Or send your spouse to get you the gift you REALLY want.)

There will be a bunch of drums, but it's first-come first served, so I suggest you get here early to get the widest selection. All the prices are going to be really good prices too. You won't find a better deal than these!
item.name: Drum Sale Party - And Other Cool Gifts
